ABOUT

I first discovered visual artist Samuel Mead AKA ‘Beg4Cred’ on Instagram and was instantly pulled in by his expressive free-hand drawings. His style is simple and experimental. It feels authentic, unique, exciting. He’s been a Peckham resident for eleven years, and I met him at his home tattoo studio to talk about art, community and how creativity is for everyone.
